trans-unit.source: Exposes a <xref:System.IO.Stream> around a named pipe, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.
trans-unit.target: 公開<xref:System.IO.Stream>周圍具名管道，同時支援同步與非同步讀取和寫入作業。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients.
trans-unit.target: 具名的管道的管道伺服器和一或多個管道用戶端之間的通訊，提供單向或雙工的管道。

trans-unit.source: Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network.
trans-unit.target: 具名的管道可以用於處理序間通訊，在本機或網路。

trans-unit.source: A single pipe name can be shared by multiple <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> objects.
trans-unit.target: 可由多個共用單一的管道名稱<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>物件。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both.
trans-unit.target: 任何處理程序可做為具名的管道伺服器或用戶端，或兩者。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的[!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)]，最多 10 個管道同時可以透過網路連線。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref>類別具有指定的管道名稱。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object that has the following characteristics: - A default pipe direction of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>具有下列特性的物件:- <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>預設管道方向</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: - The maximum number of server instances that share the same name set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 的共用相同名稱的伺服器執行個體最大數目設為 1。

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode> <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>值</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions> <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>值</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>

trans-unit.source: - Default input and output buffer sizes.
trans-unit.target: 的預設輸入和輸出緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: - No pipe security.
trans-unit.target: -沒有管道安全性。

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> value of <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>值</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>

trans-unit.source: - No specified additional <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>.
trans-unit.target: -沒有指定其他<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: The name of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 管道名稱。

trans-unit.source: pipeName is .
trans-unit.target: pipeNameis .

trans-unit.source: pipeName is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: pipeName為零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: pipeName is set to "anonymous".
trans-unit.target: pipeName設定為 「 匿名 」。

trans-unit.source: pipeName contains a colon (":").
trans-unit.target: pipeName含有冒號 (":")。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 98, or Windows 95, which are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統是 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 98 或 Windows 95 不支援。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of server instances has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 已超過伺服器執行個體數目上限。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object that has the following characteristics: - A default value of 1 for the maximum number of server instances that share the same name.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>具有下列特性的物件:-預設值為 1，共用相同名稱的伺服器執行個體的數目上限。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: - A default <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>.
trans-unit.target: -預設<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>值為<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions> <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>值</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>

trans-unit.source: - Default input and output buffer sizes.
trans-unit.target: 的預設輸入和輸出緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: - No pipe security.
trans-unit.target: -沒有管道安全性。

trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>值</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>

trans-unit.source: - No specified additional <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>.
trans-unit.target: -沒有指定其他<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: The name of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 管道名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the direction of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，決定管道的方向。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of server instances that share the same name.
trans-unit.target: 共用相同名稱的伺服器執行個體的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: You can pass <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.MaxAllowedServerInstances"></xref> for this value.

trans-unit.source: pipeName is .
trans-unit.target: pipeNameis .

trans-unit.source: pipeName is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: pipeName為零長度字串。

trans-unit.source: pipeName is set to "anonymous".
trans-unit.target: pipeName設定為 「 匿名 」。

trans-unit.source: -or- direction is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: -direction不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: -or- A non-negative number is required.
trans-unit.target: -或者-非負數數字。

trans-unit.source: -or- maxNumberofServerInstances is less than -1 or greater than 254 (-1 indicates ) -or- or is required.
trans-unit.target: -maxNumberofServerInstances小於-1 或大於 254 (-1 表示 )-或需要。

trans-unit.source: -or- Access rights is limited to the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights"></xref> , <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights"></xref> , and <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights"></xref> flags.
trans-unit.target: -或-的存取權限僅限於<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights"> </xref> ， <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights"> </xref> ，和<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights"></xref>旗標。

trans-unit.target: pipeName含有冒號 (":")。

trans-unit.target: 作業系統是 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 98 或 Windows 95 不支援。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of server instances has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 已超過伺服器執行個體數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> class from the specified pipe handle.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref>類別，從指定的管道控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the direction of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，決定管道的方向。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the handle was opened asynchronously; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示控制代碼已開啟以非同步的方式;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the pipe is connected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示已連接管道。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A safe handle for the pipe that this <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 安全控制代碼之管道這個<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref>物件將會封裝。

trans-unit.source: direction is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: direction不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: safePipeHandle is .
trans-unit.target: safePipeHandleis .

trans-unit.source: safePipeHandle is an invalid handle.
trans-unit.target: safePipeHandle是無效的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: safePipeHandle is not a valid pipe handle.
trans-unit.target: safePipeHandle不是有效的管道控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: -or- The maximum number of server instances has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: -或者-已超過伺服器執行個體數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe name, pipe direction, maximum number of server instances, transmission mode, pipe options, and recommended in and out buffer sizes.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object that has the following characteristics: - No additional pipe security.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>具有下列特性的物件:-沒有其他使用管線傳送安全性。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: - No specified additional <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>.
trans-unit.target: -沒有指定其他<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: The name of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 管道名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the direction of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，決定管道的方向。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of server instances that share the same name.
trans-unit.target: 共用相同名稱的伺服器執行個體的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 98, or Windows 95, which are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統是 Windows Millennium Edition、 Windows 98 或 Windows 95 不支援。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of server instances has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 已超過伺服器執行個體數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to wait for a client to connect.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業以等候用戶端連接。

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous equivalent of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非同步方法相當於<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.EndWaitForConnection%2A> must be called exactly once for every call to BeginWaitForConnection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.EndWaitForConnection%2A>必須正好一次針對呼叫 BeginWaitForConnection 每次呼叫。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.EndWaitForConnection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method to call when a client connects to the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 當用戶端連線時要呼叫的方法<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous request from other requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用者提供的物件，可從其他要求中辨別這個特定非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: An object that references the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: 物件，參考非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: The pipe was not opened asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 管道未以非同步方式開啟。

trans-unit.source: -or- A pipe connection has already been established.
trans-unit.target: -或者-管道連線已建立。

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: -或者-尚未設定管道控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The pipe connection has been broken.
trans-unit.target: 管道連線已中斷。

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: 管道已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Disconnects the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 中斷目前的連接。

trans-unit.source: Calling the Disconnect method will block until all the sent characters have been read unless the transmission mode of the pipe is set to <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode> and the buffer size is set in the constructor that created the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫中斷連線方法會封鎖，直到除非管道的傳輸模式設為已讀取已傳送的所有字元<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>而建立的建構函式中設定的緩衝區大小<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>物件。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>

trans-unit.source: In this case, not all of the messages will be received.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，所有的訊息將會接收。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.WaitForPipeDrain%2A> causes the server to block until all the data has been read from the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.WaitForPipeDrain%2A>會導致封鎖，直到已從管道讀取所有資料的伺服器。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.WaitForPipeDrain%2A>

trans-unit.source: No pipe connections have been made yet.
trans-unit.target: 已進行管道連線。

trans-unit.source: -or- The connected pipe has already disconnected.
trans-unit.target: -或者-已連接的管道已中斷連接。

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: -或者-尚未設定管道控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: 管道已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous operation to wait for a client to connect.
trans-unit.target: 結束非同步作業以等候用戶端連接。

trans-unit.source: EndWaitForConnection must be called exactly once for every call to <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.BeginWaitForConnection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 必須正好一次呼叫 EndWaitForConnection，每次呼叫至<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.BeginWaitForConnection%2A>。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.BeginWaitForConnection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pending asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: 暫止的非同步要求。

trans-unit.source: asyncResult is .
trans-unit.target: asyncResultis .

trans-unit.source: The pipe was not opened asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 管道未以非同步方式開啟。

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: -或者-尚未設定管道控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The pipe connection has been broken.
trans-unit.target: 管道連線已中斷。

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: 管道已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> instance is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 釋出 unmanaged 的資源並執行其他清除作業之前<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref>執行個體回收進行回收。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 取得管道另一端上的用戶端的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The GetImpersonationUserName method returns `null` if the client has not yet written to the pipe or if the connected client did not connect with a <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> of <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>.
trans-unit.target: GetImpersonationUserName 方法會傳回`null`如果用戶端具有尚未寫入管道，或連線的用戶端未使用<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>的<xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>。</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel></xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>連接

trans-unit.source: The user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 管道另一端上的用戶端使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: No pipe connections have been made yet.
trans-unit.target: 已進行管道連線。

trans-unit.source: -or- The connected pipe has already disconnected.
trans-unit.target: -或者-已連接的管道已中斷連接。

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: -或者-尚未設定管道控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: 管道已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The pipe connection has been broken.
trans-unit.target: 管道連線已中斷。

trans-unit.source: -or- The user name of the client is longer than 19 characters.
trans-unit.target: -或者-用戶端的使用者名稱長度超過 19 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Represents the maximum number of server instances that the system resources allow.
trans-unit.target: 表示系統資源允許的伺服器執行個體的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Use the MaxAllowedServerInstances when creating a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object to set the maximum number of server instances that the system resources allow.
trans-unit.target: 在建立時使用 MaxAllowedServerInstances<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>物件來設定系統資源允許的伺服器執行個體的數目上限。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Calls a delegate while impersonating the client.
trans-unit.target: 在模擬用戶端時呼叫委派。

trans-unit.source: The connecting client's permissions are applied to the remote server.
trans-unit.target: 連接的用戶端的權限會套用到遠端伺服器。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the connecting client tries to request the contents of a file on the server, the client can request only files that it has sufficient permissions to open.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果連接的用戶端嘗試要求的伺服器上的檔案內容，用戶端可以要求它有足夠的權限開啟的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The delegate that specifies a method to call.
trans-unit.target: 指定要呼叫之方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: No pipe connections have been made yet.
trans-unit.target: 已進行管道連線。

trans-unit.source: -or- The connected pipe has already disconnected.
trans-unit.target: -或者-已連接的管道已中斷連接。

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: -或者-尚未設定管道控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: 管道已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The pipe connection has been broken.
trans-unit.target: 管道連線已中斷。

trans-unit.source: -or- An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: -或者-發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Waits for a client to connect to this <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 等待用戶端連線到這個<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object to block until a client connects.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會導致<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>來封鎖，直到用戶端連線物件。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: A pipe connection has already been established.
trans-unit.target: 管道連線已建立。

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: -或者-尚未設定管道控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: 管道已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The pipe connection has been broken.
trans-unit.target: 管道連線已中斷。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously waits for a client to connect to this <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式等候用戶端連線到這個<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Because it is asynchronous, this method returns immediately, but the connection process is completed when the client calls <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因為它是非同步的這個方法會立即傳回，但當用戶端呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A></xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>完成連線程序

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous wait operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步等候作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously waits for a client to connect to this <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式等候用戶端連線到這個<xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref>物件，並且監視取消要求。

trans-unit.source: Because it is asynchronous, this method returns immediately, but the connection process is completed when the client calls <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因為它是非同步的這個方法會立即傳回，但當用戶端呼叫<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>或<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A></xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>完成連線程序

trans-unit.source: Cancellation requests using the cancellation token will only work if the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object was created with a pipe option value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions?displayProperty=fullName> or if the cancellation occurs before the WaitForConnectionAsync method is called.
trans-unit.target: 取消要求使用取消語彙基元才<xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>管道選項值是建立物件<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions?displayProperty=fullName>或是取消 WaitForConnectionAsync 方法呼叫之前發生。</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要用於監控取消要求的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous wait operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步等候作業的工作。
